meanings.definition: A colonial marine animal of the class Hydrozoa.
meanings.sent1: The hydroids in the ocean form beautiful colonies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of hydroids in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The hydroids had a party in their underwater neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The hydroids swayed gently in the currents like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the colorful hydroids at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Any of various colonial marine hydrozoans.
meanings.sent1: Divers encountered a group of hydroids while exploring the reef.
meanings.sent2: Hydroids are fascinating creatures that live in colonies.
meanings.sent3: The hydroids played hide and seek in the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: The hydroids spread out like a delicate underwater garden.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were mesmerized by the delicate beauty of the hydroids.
